mapper.select: SELECT r.resource_id, r.course_id, r.name, r.type, r.url, r.upload_time, r.uploader_id, r.size, r.duration, r.description, r.view_count FROM resource r JOIN task_resource tr ON r.resource_id = tr.resource_id WHERE tr.task_id = #{taskId}

SELECT kp.point_id, kp.course_id, kp.name, kp.description, kp.sort_order, kp.created_at, kp.updated_at, kp.difficulty FROM knowledge_point kp JOIN task_knowledge_point tkp ON kp.point_id = tkp.point_id WHERE tkp.task_id = #{taskId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO task (task_id, course_id, title, description, type, deadline, max_score, created_at) VALUES (#{taskId}, #{courseId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{type}, #{deadline}, #{maxScore}, NOW())

INSERT INTO task_resource (task_id, resource_id, created_at) VALUES
(#{taskId}, #{resourceId}, NOW())

INSERT INTO task_knowledge_point (task_id, point_id, created_at) VALUES
(#{taskId}, #{pointId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM submission WHERE task_id = #{taskId}
